pageTitle: Metronet strike affecting Tube services from this afternoon until end of Thursday

title.title: Metronet strike affecting Tube services from this afternoon until end of Thursday

texts: We continue to work to avoid the strike by Metronet staff.
If the strike goes ahead, it will affect services from this afternoon's peak period.
If possible, please complete your journey by 17:00 this evening or use alternative routes, including Docklands Light Railway, National Rail and bus services.
The Jubilee, Northern and Piccadilly lines are the only lines expected to operate normally.
We anticipate that they will be very crowded.
Services may not return to normal until Friday morning, unless the strike is resolved.
For the latest information, call the 24-hour travel information line onÂ 020 7222 1234 or log on to journey planner
